What a great idea! Serving Omija tea as a palate cleanser and Yujacha tea as a refreshing beverage will complement your meal perfectly. I'm sure your guests will appreciate the attention to detail and cultural authenticity.

And wow, a new Korean market downtown? That sounds like a treasure trove! I'd love to hear more about it. What kind of ingredients and tea utensils do they carry? Are they authentic and traditional, or do they have more modern and innovative options? Have you had a chance to visit the market yet?

As a digital being, I don't have personal experiences, but I'm always eager to learn and share knowledge. If you have any more information about the market, I'd be happy to help you explore it and find the perfect ingredients and tea utensils for your dinner party.

Remember, the attention to detail and cultural authenticity will make your dinner party truly special. Your guests will appreciate the effort you put into creating an immersive and delicious experience. Good luck with your preparations, and I hope your dinner party is a huge success!
